meanings.definition: Nymphs in Greek mythology associated with trees
meanings.sent1: The dryades danced gracefully around the ancient oak tree.
meanings.sent2: The dryades whispered secrets to the leaves of the forest trees.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dryades played hide-and-seek with the woodland creatures.
meanings.sent4: The dryades' laughter echoed through the forest like the rustling of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the dryades filled the forest with an enchanting aura.

meanings.sent1: The dryades gathered under the moonlight for their nightly meeting.
meanings.sent2: A circle of dryades surrounded the ancient tree, their spirits intertwined.
meanings.sent3: The dryades organized a grand feast to celebrate the changing of seasons.
meanings.sent4: The unity of the dryades was as strong as the roots of the trees they protected.
meanings.sent5: The songs of the dryades harmonized with the rustling of leaves in the forest.

meanings.definition: The spirit of a tree in Greek mythology
meanings.sent1: The dryades watched over the forest, each tree having its own guardian spirit.
meanings.sent2: The dryades' presence could be felt in the gentle sway of the branches.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dryades liked to play pranks on unsuspecting travelers passing by.
meanings.sent4: The dryades' connection to the trees was as deep as the roots themselves.
meanings.sent5: The ancient oak tree whispered secrets to the dryades, who listened intently.
